ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p:
Work and contribute towards the engineering of Apple HomePod technologies in the Interactive Media Group (IMG) at Apple. IMG provides the media and graphics foundation across all of Apple's innovative products, including iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, Apple TV, iTunes, and macOS. Developing cutting-edge software techniques, IMG takes the media experience to the next level.
We are looking for an outstanding software quality engineer with a strong technical background and understanding of Media and Wi-Fi technologies. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and conducting tests for HomePod product in the IMG Quality Engineering group at Apple.

ul.li: Experience in Wireless Data Transmission testing
Proficiency in Python, Perl and/or shell scripting
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Ability to manage multiple tasks and prioritize work accordingly
Solid knowledge of various video and audio media formats
Familiarity with iOS, macOS, Unix, and Xcode

div.p:
Your focus will be to develop, maintain and execute HomePod feature and functional test plans across a variety of network topologies to ensure the highest quality of HomePod functionality before it reaches our customers’ hands. Testing will comprise of Functional, Feature, Regression testing and Automation development. Automation will be key to this role’s success.
You will be also be responsible for the development of methodical testing strategies, creating & tracking high quality bug reports, and reporting on project progress & risk analysis. You will work very closely with the HomePod development, project management and cross-functional QA teams to ensure great quality for this amazing product.
B.S. in Computer Science or equivalent experience.
